translation: When the mind, restrained by the practice of yoga, attains quietude, and when one sees the Self by the Self, they are satisfied in their own Self.
commentary: 6.20 Where where? Uparamate attains ietude? Chittam mind? restrained restrained? by the practice of Yoga? where where? f and? Eve only? Atmana by the Self? Atmana the Self? seeing seeing? Atmani in the Self? satisfied is satisfied.Commentary The verses 20? 21? 22 and 23 must be taken together.When is the mind completely withdrawn from the objects of the senses? supreme peace reigns within the heart.
